snippet: The Treasury Department reached the settlement over accusations of noncompliance with United States sanctions against Iran, Cuba and other countries.
abstract: Treasury Department reaches a $619 million settlement with ING Bank over accusations of noncompliance with United States sanctions against Iran, Cuba and other countries; fine is largest a bank has paid for sanctions violations.
lead_paragraph: The Treasury Department reached the settlement over accusations of noncompliance with United States sanctions against Iran, Cuba and other countries.

headline.main: ING Bank to Pay $619 Million to Settle Inquiry Into Sanctions Violations
headline.print_headline: ING Bank to Pay $619 Million to Settle Inquiry Into Sanctions Violations
